titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to require cyber certification for small business development center counselors, and for other purposes.
Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2019
Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2019
Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2019

Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2019
Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Reported by the Committee on Small Business. H. Rept. 116-112.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 81.

action.text: Mr. Delgado moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1649.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 150.

bill.summary:
Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2019
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to establish a program for certifying at least 5 or 10% of the total number of employees of a small business development center to provide cybersecurity planning assistance to small businesses.
